name: "MAGNOLIA" ACCENT TABLES
description:
Country Cottage accent tables with two-tiers. Adorned with spindles.
The timeless design and beautiful workmanship build the foundation of these antique accent tables. An antique white weathered finish adds the perfect amount of vintage charm.


Height x 26 inches

Width x 20 inches

Depth x 20 inches 


This one-of-a-kind piece wears a natural patina that has been aged and distressed from years of love and daily use.


PAYMENT OPTIONS:

Paypal, cash (payment upon pick-up or local delivery) 


SHIPPING AND DELIVERY:

FREE local delivery within 50 miles of 29365 (South Carolina). Pick-ups are welcomed by appointment only. No additional shipping costs for pick-up or local delivery areas. All other areas, shipping rates will apply. Contact us for exact shipping quote prior to checkout (may vary depending on location). 


CONTACT:

To place an order or make an appointment to view an item, contact us at:

Website: http://www.nookandcrannyco.com/

Email: NookandCrannyCompany@gmail.com

Phone: (864) 279-5612

name: "PRISCILLA" WHITEWASH DINING TABLE
description:
Lovely French antique white-washed swing gate dining table made of solid walnut. 
Expands via 2 drop leaves on each side. Solid and sturdy. 
Elegant and shabby chic.

This one-of-a-kind piece wears a natural patina that has been aged and distressed from years of love and daily use.
